content: संरुध् {c7c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To obstruct, detain, stop; स चेत्तु पाथ संरुद्धः पशभिर्वा रथेन वा <ls>Ms. 8. 295.</ls> {@--2@} To impede, obstruct, prevent; रांरुद्धचेष्टस्य <ls>R. 2. 43.</ls> {@--3@} To hold fast, enchain; तृणमिव लघु लक्ष्मीर्नैव तान् संरुणद्धि <ls>Bh. 2. 17.</ls> {@--4@} To seize upon, grasp, catch hold of; <ls>Ms. 8. 235.</ls> {@--5@} To besiege, blockade, invest. {@--6@} To cover up, conceal. {@--7@} To withhold, refuse.
